prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: impressionist oil painting style, with rich light and shadow variations, visible brushstrokes, full-body character design, pure white background, character standing centered, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words. A young man of divine beauty, the most beloved child of the Sun God, standing with an elegant and intelligent posture. His face is exquisitely sculpted, almost ethereal, with a radiant complexion like warm sunlight filtered through alabaster. His features are delicate yet strong: perfectly arched eyebrows, long, dark eyelashes framing eyes that hold the deep gold and amber hues of a sunset, sparkling with profound wisdom and gentle warmth. His nose is straight and noble, his lips are full and softly curved in a serene, compassionate expression. He has high cheekbones and a slender jawline. His hair is long, flowing like spun sunlight, a cascade of golden-white strands with subtle highlights of honey and platinum, loosely tied back with a simple, shimmering golden cord, a few delicate strands framing his face. He wears elegant, layered robes in the style of the luminous kingdoms of Aetheria. The inner robe is a soft, creamy white, made of a fine, gossamer-like silk that seems to glow from within. Over this, he wears a sleeveless surcoat of deep, luminous gold, edged with intricate, vine-like embroidery in silver thread that resembles sunbeams and budding leaves. The fabric has a slight metallic sheen, catching the light. A wide, silken sash in a gradient of sky blue to pale lavender is tied at his waist. His attire is graceful and regal, suggesting both his divine heritage and his high intellect. His demeanor is one of serene confidence, calm intelligence, and immense charisma, his presence radiating a gentle, comforting light that seems to purify the space around him. The overall atmosphere is poetic, beautiful, and delicate, fitting the world of "Children of the Sun God"., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

side.prompt:
Generate a full-body, side-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Facing left. Standing with arms relaxed at sides.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

back.prompt:
Generate a full-body, back-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. No facial features should be visible.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
